Industrial Edition | December 16, 2013
Confidential & Proprietary
PC200 Industrial Process Controller Now Available for Sale The Badger Meter PC200 is a microprocessor-driven instrument designed for batching and filling both small and large quantities, as well as displaying total, accumulated total and flow rate. Designed to interface with our complete line of industrial flow meters, it totalizes, indicates and controls fluid flows. Many years of experience in the industrial market has allowed Badger Meter to incorporate features indispensable in the liquid batching and control operations. Download: PC200 Product Data Sheet Please contact Peter Vander Grinten with any questions.
Planning for the Holidays? Give Badger Meter Gear A great way to keep Badger Meter top of mind, now and throughout the year, is to wear branded apparel and to give items as gifts. Now you can conveniently shop for a wide range of Badger Meter merchandise – from shirts and hats to water bottles and pens – using the online store located on the Badger Meter extranet. New merchandise will be made available over time and suggestions are always welcome. Special notes:
Distributors and Sales Reps: Purchases of Badger Meter promotional items by distributors and representatives are eligible for applicable co-op programs, according to the requirements of the program. Badger Meter Employees: All purchases made by Badger Meter employees should be placed online, using the employee's credit card. Please do not call or email ABC Gifts/Branovan directly to place orders. Badger Meter Trade Shows and Events: Trade Show mandated apparel for Badger Meter staff will be ordered through Amie Williams, Badger Meter Sr. Marketing Events Specialist. These special orders will be placed for Badger Meter employees at no charge.
If you have any questions please contact Judson Luke or Amie Williams.
2014 Price Lists
REMINDER: New price lists for 2014 are available on the Badger Meter extranet. Price lists are available for authorized sales representatives and distributors only.
In addition to price lists, we will be releasing new discount schedules. Sales representatives will be notified of their applicable discount schedules by separate correspondence.
